text: I seem to remember there was a seemingly innocuous Issue (maybe PR?) on the Julia repo several years back that was actually instrumental in making the whole Cassette / Zygote machinery possible... does anyone happen to remember which it is?

elements.text: I seem to remember there was a seemingly innocuous Issue (maybe PR?) on the Julia repo several years back that was actually instrumental in making the whole Cassette / Zygote machinery possible... does anyone happen to remember which it is?

text: Ah I think <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/22440> and <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/21146> is what I was thinking of

elements.text: is what I was thinking of
